pages.text: $(li)The Warped Forest is green-like biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)No hostile creatures can appears in this biome.$(br)$(li)You can find Warped trees, Shroomlights, Warped, Crimson Roots, Warped Fungus and Crimson Fungus here.
$(li)Some creatures like Warpbeetles and Shroomloins can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Warped Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
